transport.question: I go on the road, and I have wheels. Toot toot!

hints.text: 🚗 I help you travel from place to place.
👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 I can carry your family.
⛽️ I need gas to go.

transport.question: I float on water and can be big or small.

hints.text: 🌊 I travel on oceans and lakes.
⚓️ I can have sails or an engine.
🛥️ Pirates sometimes use me!

transport.question: I fly in the sky and take people far away.

hints.text: ☁️ I have wings.
💺 You sit inside me to travel.
✈️ I fly very high.

transport.question: I travel on tracks and carry lots of people.

hints.text: 🛤️ I make a 'choo choo' sound.
🚂 I have many carriages.
⏱️ I run on a schedule.

transport.question: I have two wheels and you pedal to move me.

hints.text: 🚲 You need to balance to ride me.
🔔 I often have a bell.
🚴 I am good exercise.

transport.question: I am big and yellow and take kids to school.

hints.text: 🛑 I have flashing lights when I stop.
🎒 Many students ride on me.
🚌 I am longer than a car.

transport.question: I help build things on construction sites and have a big scoop.

hints.text: 👷I dig and move dirt.
🚧 I am often orange or yellow.
🚜 I have a very strong engine.

transport.question: I have a siren and flashing lights and help people in emergencies.

hints.text: 🚨I rush to accidents and fires.
👨‍⚕️ I might take you to the hospital.
🚑 I'm faster than a regular car.

transport.question: I carry things and can be very big. Sometimes I use a trailer

hints.text: 📦I deliver packages.
🚚 I have many wheels.
⛽ I use a lot of fuel.

transport.question: I have a seat for one person and two wheels, but I'm not a bicycle. I go fast!

hints.text: 🛵 You need to wear a helmet to ride me.
🚦 I have an engine.
🛣️ I'm smaller than a car but faster than a bike.

bug.question: I have six legs and I like to crawl. Sometimes I tickle!

hints.text: 🐜 I am very small and can be found on the ground
🧺 I often carry food much bigger than me back to my home
💪 I'm known for being very strong for my size

bug.question: I can fly and I like to land on flowers to drink yummy juice.

hints.text: 🌸 I like colourful places
🦋 I start as a caterpillar
🌈 You can see me in many colours

bug.question: I make honey for you to eat. I live in a hive.

hints.text: 🐝 I buzz around
🌻 I like to collect yellow dust from flowers
🍯 My home is full of sweet goo

bug.question: I jump very high and I'm green. I make a chirping sound.

hints.text: 🌿 I am often found in grassy areas.
🎵 I can be very noisy in the summer.
🐸 Some animals like to eat me.

bug.question: I light up the night sky, like a tiny star.

hints.text: ✨ I have a glow
💡 I use my light to attract a friend
🌙 You see me when it gets dark

bug.question: I like to eat wood. Sometimes I make a house fall down!

hints.text: 🪵 I am found where there is wood
🏠 People don't want me in their houses
🐜 I live in a colony and work together

bug.question: I make a sticky web to catch my food.

hints.text: 🕸️ I have eight legs.
🕷️ I am not an insect.
🦟 Flies are my favorite snack.

bug.question: I am red, black, or yellow, and have spots on my back. People say I'm lucky.

hints.text: 🐞 I am a small, round beetle
🌱 I like to eat aphids in gardens
🍀 Finding me is said to bring good fortune

bug.question: I fly around at night and like to drink your blood. Ouch!

hints.text: 🧛‍♀️ I am a pest
🦟 I make an itchy bite
🦇 Some people think I am like a tiny vampire

bug.question: I have big eyes and transparent wings. I like to fly near water.

hints.text: 🌊 I am often near rivers or lakes
👀 I have excellent vision
🚁 I dart around very quickly
